content: the crochet pencil chapstick holder and keychain is a beginner-friendly pattern that works up quickly and because of the endless color options is a great way to use up all your scrap yarn too it s perfect for making a quick thank you gift for friends and teachers for selling at craft fairs adding a little extra something to a gift and for simply having a fun and unique way to carry your chapstick the pattern also includes instructions for turning the pencil into a regular amigurumi pencil if desired beware you re going to love making them in all the colors happy crocheting pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the patterns are formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is beginner + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase working in the back loops of a stitch and the adjustable magic ring materials needed to complete the crochet pencil chapstick holder and keychain you will need + yarn in your choice of colors about 22 yds of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + scissors + keyring finished measurements + using hook size e/4 3 5 mm the pencil measures approximately 3 75 inches 9 5 cm long 2 7/8 inches 7 3 cm in circumference and 1 inch 2 5 cm in diameter at the top of
